thread.title: MH
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by MH

author: MH
title: MH
text: Bought a Barbour Durham Jacket for my husband to replace one that he's had for 4 years. The sevice was excellent, and the price was the lowest I could find. Indeed cheaper than the price we paid for the original jacket. Thank you Country Attire Team. Will be sure to use this company again
